revised_title: Observations on the Structure and Functions of the Heart Valves
tldr: The author examines the structure and connections of the heart valves, specifically the auriculo-ventricular and arterial valves. They observe the relation of the "four orifices" in the base of the heart and explain the role of muscular borders and fibrous zones in the valves' function. The author also discusses the presence of elastic fibers in the valves and the structure of the heart bones that support the aortic orifice.
